editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-17v: Image of the Covenant of Mercy, መልክአ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ምሕረት፡. Répertoire 360. F-24r: Image of Saint Mark, Mälk‘a Marqos, መልክአ፡ ማርቆስ፡. Répertoire 198. Incipit: ስላም ለፅንሰትከ በሀገረ ዓባይ ገሊላ. -32v: Image of Gabriel, Mälk‘a Gäbra’el, መልክአ፡ ገብርኤል፡, incipit: ሰላመ: ገብርኤል: መልአክ: በላዕለ: ማርያም: ዘአዕረፈ:. Répertoire 246; MG 312ff. F-48r: Image of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, Mälk‘a Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡, begins with a section not in Répertoire. Incipit: ናሁ ወጠንኩ በከመ ስርአታ ወሕጋ; but then moves to what we have in Répertoire 162. F-60v: Image of Peter and Paul, መልክአ: ጴጥሮስ: ወጳውሎስ:, Répertoire 187. Incipit : ሰላም: ለዝክረ: ስምክሙ: ዘአልባስጥሮስ: አፈው: F-65r: Image of Rufa’el, Mälk‘a Rufa’el, መልክአ፡ ሩፋኤል፡. Répertoire 215. EMML, 1217 (IV:198). F-76r: Image of the Savior of the World, Mälk‘a Mädḫane Aläm, መልክአ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡. Répertoire 339; MG 226ff. EMIP 1909. F-79v: Layman's Prayer Notes: (passim) mentions the scribe, ወልደ ብርሃን.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
